title: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds (PUBG)
description: PUBG is a fast-paced battle royale where 100 players fight for survival using strategy, shooting, and teamwork.

title: Call of Duty: Warzone
description: Warzone brings Call of Duty's signature combat to a massive online arena with squads and high-stakes survival.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft lets you build, explore, and survive in endless blocky worlds filled with creativity and adventure.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite mixes shooting, building, and creativity in one of the most iconic battle royale experiences.

title: Valorant
description: Valorant combines precise gunplay with unique hero abilities in a competitive tactical shooter.

title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a squad-based hero shooter set in a fast, futuristic battle royale arena.

title: Genshin Impact
description: Genshin Impact offers an open world full of elemental magic, storytelling, and adventure.

title: Counter-Strike 2
description: Counter-Strike 2 refines tactical FPS gameplay with improved visuals, smoother mechanics, and realism.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: Cyberpunk 2077 immerses players in a futuristic open world full of choices, chaos, and technology.

title: Among Us
description: Among Us is a fun social deduction game where you uncover impostors aboard a spaceship.

title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring blends deep lore, brutal combat, and an open world designed by FromSoftware.

title: God of War Ragnarok
description: Kratos and Atreus return in an epic journey across the Norse realms to face destiny.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: RDR2 delivers an emotional Western epic in a beautifully crafted open world.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3 is a masterpiece RPG filled with rich storytelling and monster hunting.

title: League of Legends
description: LoL is a competitive 5v5 MOBA where strategy, teamwork, and skill decide victory.

title: Dota 2
description: Dota 2 is a deep and complex strategy MOBA with intense team battles.

title: Overwatch 2
description: Overwatch 2 brings high-speed, colorful team combat with new heroes and modes.

title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage
description: A return to stealth roots, Assassin’s Creed Mirage takes players to ancient Baghdad.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: Zelda: TOTK continues Link’s journey with physics-based puzzles and vast exploration.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: GTA V is an iconic open-world action game full of freedom, chaos, and storytelling.
